Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to the disposition of campaign funds upon the conviction of a felony of a candidate, former candidate or holder of elective office
Summary: Sets forth the means of the disposition of campaign funds upon the conviction of a felony of a candidate, former candidate or holder of elective office.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the disposition of campaign funds upon the conviction of a felony of a candidate, former candidate or holder of elective office
